## kl switch env

switch to a different environment

### Synopsis

```
Switch Environment
Examples:
  # switch to a different environment
  kl env switch
	
```

### Options

```
  -a, --account string       account name
  -e, --envname string       environment name
  -h, --help                 help for env
  -p, --projectname string   project name
  -h, --help   help for env
```
